fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Check a player at night to see if they’re a non-conversion role

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If a player you check has no conversion ability, attack them
-Any non-conversion roles that visit you will be passively attacked by you that night
-You’re extra convinced by conversion roles. Anyone that attempts to convert you to a different role will have their ability work through any given immunities
-This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (May win while dead)
